sameAnalysis.word_list: always, often, usually, frequently, repeatedly, regularly
means: always ：总是，永远。语气最强，指在一切时候，没有例外。
often ：经常，语气弱于always,侧重动作发生的次数具有经常性，具体时间意味不强。
usually ：通常，通例地，指习惯性动作，频度仅次于always，较often大，偶尔有间隔。
frequently ：时常，经常，与often同义，可通用，但较正式，强调次数频繁。
repeatedly ：屡次，强调次数多，但反复的频率不一定均匀。
regularly ：用于修饰经常而有规律性的动作。

sentence.Network_en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentence.Network_cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentence.Network_en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentence.Network_cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentence.Network_en: They ate, as they usually did, in the kitchen.
sentence.Network_cn: 像平常一样，他们是在厨房吃的饭。

list.abs: where do they usually have , then ., 他们通常在哪里吃饭.
driving , I usually avoid the center ., 我通常避开在市中心驾车.

means.word_mean: 习惯地,经常地,常规地,长期地

entry.def: If something usually happens, it is the thing that most often happens in a particular situation.

example.ex: The best information about hotels usually comes from friends and acquaintances who have been there...
example.tran: 关于酒店的最可靠信息通常来自曾经去过那里的朋友和熟人。

example.ex: They ate, as they usually did, in the kitchen...
example.tran: 像平常一样，他们是在厨房吃的饭。

entry.def: You use more than usually to show that something shows even more of a particular quality than it normally does.

example.ex: She felt more than usually hungry after her excursion...
example.tran: 远足后，她比平时感觉更饿。

example.ex: He was more than usually depressed by problems at work.
example.tran: 工作上的问题使他异常沮丧。

auth_sentence.content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
auth_sentence.res_content: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BCC's usually develop in mid to late life.

auth_sentence.content: Polar bears are usually solitary and hunt on sea-ice.
auth_sentence.res_content: Polar bears are usually solitary and hunt on sea-ice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Polar bears are usually solitary and hunt on sea-ice.

auth_sentence.content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a day.
auth_sentence.res_content: This newsletter will usually be sent once a day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This newsletter will usually be sent once a day.

Sentence.sentence: Usually you will mark about 10% of a passage.
New students usually cannot offer a fair evaluation
It usually doesn't require any special attention.
At home, children usually learn about gender differences by observing and imitating their parents' behavior.
A shattering loss of confidence inspires behavior that overwhelms the normal self-correcting mechanisms that usually prevent a recession from becoming deep and prolonged: a depression
Usually when we walk through the rain forest we hear a soft sound from all the moist leaves and organic debris on the forest floor," says ecologist Daniel Nepstad.

sentences.cn: 这台发动机通常运转良好。

sentences.en: It was usually in the morning that she saw her patients.
sentences.cn: 她通常在上午看望病人。

jushi.english: We don't usually get up before nine on Sunday.
jushi.chinese: 星期天我们一般不在9点以前起床。

jushi.english: Children are usually afraid of the dark.
I get paid on Fridays, usually.
jushi.chinese: 我通常是在星期五领工资。
